resources.string: Which larger shape would be made if the two sections are fitted together?
Choose number of test to start:

This is a quick, free test to determine the level of your English. You have 30 minutes and 62 questions to answer. So be fast and have a good luck! ;) \n\nPlease note: The test scores and levels are very approximate. Your score on this test cannot be used as proof of a formal language qualification.
